title: Parisian Life Style Private Photo Shoot at Eiffel Tower
description:
Visiting Paris? 

Time to live the dream! 

Walk around the city with a local professional photographer and take home the best images of your amazing trip. In a 100% Parisian life style photo shooting, get to know Paris' highlights and secrets and keep your memories forever. 
 • 1h photo shooting with local professional photographer 
 • 50-80 high resolution EDITED photos sent by mail after the shooting 
 • groups up to ten people! 
 • Ideal for celebrating your honeymoon, engagement photos, bachelor party, family trip, birthdays and more 
 • props included for kids 
 • kids friendly activity 
 • fun, local and 100% passionate photographers!

NOTE: you will be booked in the first available hour. You will receive an email about your tour hour, meeting point and recognizing your photographer within 7 days of booking. Please check your spam and contact with us if you have not received it.

title: Paris in a Day - Private Experience
description: Explore the atmospheric neighborhoods of Paris like a local on this private custom-made tour that cleverly combines pleasurable walking moments into the historic neighborhoods with the use of private (taxi) and public (metro/bus) transportation when needed. Accompanied by your guide, enjoy walking Latin Quarter and other typical Parisian neighborhoods praised by the locals, admire landmarks like Notre-Dame, Arc de Triomphe, Louvre, Pantheon, Invalides. Discover Paris neighborhoods where you'll stroll the Luxembourg Gardens and lesser known highlights on the way. Get to navigate like a true Parisian and learn to easily and safely use Paris Metro. Receive tips on what to see and do in Paris from a local guide. Private tour ensures a completely customized experience Hassle-free pickup and drop-off at your hotel within Paris city limits. NO pick up at hotels near Paris airports (CDG, Orly, Beauvais). It's like going with your friend who knows a lot about it and wants to share it with you.

images.caption: Eating homemade ice cream in Paris

title: Parcours Bois de Vincennes - Segway Tour of Paris
description:
This 2.5 hour tour will take you through one of the capital's two lungs. On the menu: greening and gliding sensations!
Stroll along the trails of the Bois de Vincennes, discover Land Art and the peaceful Lakes of Daumesnil and Minimes.
Breaks are planned: The Great Pagoda and the Romantic Temple of Reuilly Island.
Strong points: The “Segway cross”, the Land Art, the Daumesnil lake and the surprising Tropical Garden.

title: Paris City Center "History of Paris" Guided Walking Tour - Semi-Private 8ppl Max
description: on this 2.5 hour intimate Semi-Private (8 Guest Maximum) guided tou of central Paris, Become a true flâneur – French for someone who enjoys a good stroll – Our expert guides will take show you all of the highlights including the Notre Dame Cathedral and the Tuileries Garden while ending where the guillotine once stood at the base of the world’s most famous avenue, the Champs Elysées. There will be time for a snack and restroom break during the walk.

title: The Paris Monuments Tour
description: The Paris Monuments bike tour is focused exclusively on Paris' legendary sites & attractions. You’ll see everything you have on your list, from the Notre Dame to the Eiffel Tower. You’ll cover more ground than you thought possible, experience Paris’ new and best bike lanes, and learn the history of some of the most adored museums and landmarks in the world. Our guides are well trained in Paris history, and more importantly, how to get you to each stop safely - all while gliding gleefully along!

title: Latin Quarter Paris - Exclusive Guided Walking Tour
description: With a exclusive guide, take a 2.5-hour walking tour of one of Paris’ oldest and most iconic neighborhoods—the Latin Quarter. You’ll start by the Notre-Dame Cathedral before making your way on foot to the playground of French students and the Lost Generation. Sights include the Panthéon and Luxembourg Garden. Select a morning or afternoon departure time when booking.

title: Photographer in Paris
description: Hi! I m Nina :) 10 years of experience in photography and same living in Paris - great mix for an excellent photoshooting quality. And a bit of humor and love for meeting new people. I would be glad to meet your for a photo promenade :)

title: Paris City Center & Louvre Tour Reserved Entry Included! - Semi-Private 8ppl Max
description: See it all in just one day on this joint tour between the historic center of Paris and its most famous museum, the Louvre. Our 5.5 hour semi-private (8 guest maximum) guided walking & museum combo tour lets you see it all with one of our delightful young guides. Your Semi-Private group size is limited to 8 to ensure a personalized experience.

title: Orangerie Museum Paris Exclusive Tour Reserved Entry Included
description: On this 2 hour exclusive guided museum tour, your expert guide will lead you through history to explain why this unique, yet overlooked collection is one of the best in Paris. A former home for royal orange trees, the Orangerie today houses artwork by some of France’s most notable names.

title: Explore Paris in Half a Day: Custom Tour with Local Expert Guide!
description:
Discover the best of Paris with a local guide who knows the city inside and out on this customizable tour. This tour is a perfect way to see the must-sees of Paris and also grasp the local culture.

Your guide is a local who will give you the unique perspective of a true Parisian, with an in-depth knowledge of the city's history and personal experiences of different neighborhoods. He has lived, studied, and worked in various areas and will share his personal insights and hidden gems with you.

We understand that every traveler has different interests and priorities, so once you book this tour, we will contact you to discuss what you want to see and do and craft the perfect itinerary that suits your preferences.

The sample itinerary shows what someone interested in a walking tour of the left bank could do during this tour.

images.caption: Notre-Dame and Latin Quarter Private Tour

title: Photography workshop in Paris
description:
The City of Light has many secrets, sometimes unknown to locals. Discover the intimacy of neighborhoods in a city on the move where you won't know where to turn! These three hours of session will allow you to learn new photography techniques, encourage your creativity and develop your technical skills in order to be sure to capture the shot you so desire.

Whether you are a beginner, a seasoned amateur or have several years of experience, our team of professional photographers will allow you to take your photography skills to the next level. Our condensed sessions are unique and customizable to your interests and help develop your creative vision.

title: Pere Lachaise Cemetery Guided Walking Tour - Semi-Private 8ppl Max
description: Venture to the eastern Paris landmark on this 2.5-hour, semi-private (8 Guest Maximum) guided walking tour. With its cobblestone paths, centuries-old gravestones, and famous residents, Père Lachaise is one of the world’s great cemeteries. Discover the final resting places of luminaries ranging from Oscar Wilde to Jim Morrison, and soak up the evocative, unforgettable atmosphere.

title: Skip-the-line Invalides Dome Louis XIV & Napoleon Tour - Exclusive Guided Tour
description: Discover France’s turbulent and illustrious military history on this 2 hour exclusive guided museum tour of the Musée de l’Armée. Housed inside the gold-domed building known as the Hotel des Invalides, this museum will reveal secrets and stories for both history buffs and anyone interested in topics like Napoleon and the World Wars.

title: Explore Paris Like a Local: Customized Full-Day Tour with Personal Guide!
description:
Visit Paris like you want to! Whether you're a food lover, fashion enthusiast, or history buff, we'll tailor an itinerary that perfectly suits your interests.

We are Walid and Clara, two passionate Parisians who want to help you make the most of your time in Paris. During this full-day tour, we'll introduce you to the local culture and ensure you don't miss some of the must-sees. We'll share with you our hidden gems and our favorite restaurants. 

Whether it's your first visit or you're returning for more, we will show you the must-see sights and offer plenty of suggestions for things to do.

- No fixed itinerary; we create it together over the phone
- A private guide with you the whole day
- Meet up in your hotel lobby
- Walking tour with public transportation

The itinerary is an example of a tour tailored for someone interested mainly in the history of the Left Bank but still wants to discover other sights.

title: Workshop de perfectionnement
description:
Aperture Tour offre des workshop condensés, pour des niveaux allant de développement à perfectionnement technique.

Vous voulez améliorer le côté technique de votre photographie ? Ces workshops sont conçus pour vous apprendre l'essentiel. Nos thématiques couvrent tous les niveaux, allant de "L'introduction à la photographie pour les débutants" à des sujets plus complexes tels que "L’utilisation pertinente du Flash" ou le "Light Painting". La compréhension du fonctionnement de votre appareil photo est la clé pour découvrir ses capacités et enfin libérer votre créativité.

Que vous soyez débutant, amateur éclairé ou que vous ayez plusieurs années d'expérience, notre équipe de photographes professionnels va vous permettre d’élever vos compétences de photographie au niveau supérieur. Nos workshop sont uniques et personnalisables en fonction de vos intérêts et permettent de développer votre vision créative.

title: Montmartre Tour Paris
description: Scale the heights of Paris in Montmartre, 500 feet above the city, with breathtaking panoramic views. Discover the gems of this former little village originally outside of Paris: the beautiful Sacre Coeur church with its marble Byzantine-style domes, the former artist colony and studios where Picasso, Toulouse Lautrec, Van Gogh and Degas painted their masterpieces, the ancient windmills, the still operating vineyard that produces an annual wine, and a walk on one of the best gourmet food shop streets in Paris.

title: Musée d'Orsay & Montmartre - Semi-Private 8ppl Max (Reserved Entry Included!)
description: This 5.5 hour semi-private (8 guest maximum) guided combo museum & walking tour explores origins of the Impressionist movement. Start at the Orsay Museum where you will enter directly into its main collection of artwork by the likes of Monet and Cezanne. Then head to the Montmartre neighborhood and experience the surrounding that is the background of the impressionist's lives. The tour can welcome up to 8 guests and includes transportation between the two locations.

title: Book your Amazing Photo Shoot in Paris
Versailles Palace Private Half Day Guided Tour including Hotel Pickup from Paris
description:
This Half-Day Private Tour in Versailles is the opportunity to discover the most famous palace in the world and surely also the largest castle with its 67,000 m2 and 700 rooms. During your visit to the residence of Louis XIV, the Sun King, your guide will make you admire the state apartments of Louis XIV and the magnificent and amazing "Hall of Mirrors." After this exceptional visit, you will have free time to discover the beautiful French Gardens with 55 fountains before returning to Paris.

- Skip-the-Line Tickets to the Palace and Gardens for your comfort and to guarantee you an easy access to the Palace of Versailles.
- The tour is completely adapted with a customized itinerary.
- Multilingual Licenced Driver-Guide accustomed to VIP customers.
- Premium service at a very competitive price.

title: Discovery of Montmartre in a 2CV - 45 min
description:
Original experience for exploring Paris in 45min

Pick up and drop off from any place in the center of Paris

title: Stroll a Local French market & have a picnic
description:
This perfect food lovers activity has been picked to be featured on NBC Today Show with Hoda & Jenna. Segment hosted by Donna Farizan.
Paris is known as a major gastronomical dream destination and French markets are the perfect place to begin. So, come along for an informative stroll at a lively, colorful and true local outdoor market. You'll indulge your senses with an abundance of aromas, of colors while sharpening your taste buds with local delights.

You'll learn informally all about this exciting aspect of our French lifestyle. With the help of your knowledgeable and personable guide, you'll use easy French key sentences to easily interact with vendors and feel like a Parisian for the day. A convivial French picnic with wine and our selection from the market will follow at a nearby peaceful park. The perfect reward to sprinkle up your Parisian journey. Joyfully Yours !

title: Historical Outdoor Escape Game in Paris: The Stone of Nicolas Flamel
description:
A mix between a treasure hunt, a historical excursion and an escape game, you are invited to an immersive trip in the heart of Paris !

Equipped with handbags containing mysterious objects, antique maps and enigmatic drawings, you will explore the city and its history, solving ancient mysteries.

A new way to discover Paris, its secret history and places.

You'll leave having discovered some hidden gems of Paris and stories about the city, having had lots of fun in the process !

title: Paris Secret 2CV tour - 3H
description:
This visit in 2CV of 3h is ideal to discover the city and discover the great Parisian monuments but also unsuspected neighborhoods secret places including Parisians themselves.

During the visit, you will benefit from anecdotes of guide drivers who meet all your expectations.

Very beautiful photos are taken during the visit to immortalize this moment.

title: Private photo session in Paris
description: A short circuit but rather rich because it allows you to see the Eiffel Tower from a different point of view. This experience offers a short walk accompanied by a professional photographer to immortalize this dream moment
